allExperience.companyDescription: A leading IoT and smart home automation company in India, Oob Automation specializes in wireless automation systems tailored to diverse needs and budgets. With a focus on safety, security, comfort, and energy efficiency, they offer solutions for residential, industrial, and commercial sectors, including smart agriculture, hospitals, and hotels. Their services include smart home systems, home theaters, sensor lighting, and security systems, with seamless integration of Google Home and Amazon Alexa for voice control. Known for innovative, affordable, and reliable technologies, Oob Automation caters to both new and existing constructions with minimal disruption.

A dynamic web and mobile app development company with offices in India and the USA, BrainyBeam specializes in creating cutting-edge solutions across industries like healthcare, retail, travel, education, and more. They excel in IoT, offline apps, secure products, BLE development, and social and healthcare applications. Known for innovation, quality, and timely delivery, BrainyBeam has launched over 50 web apps and 80+ mobile apps on platforms including iOS, Android, Windows, and cross-platform frameworks. Headquartered in Ahmedabad, Gujarat, they boast a talented team of 50+ developers and marketers.

allTestimonial.reviewText: It was a great experience working with Mann Ambani on our Garden Nerds capstone project. As part of our academic team, Mann demonstrated a strong work ethic, technical expertise in Android development, and a solid understanding of entrepreneurship. His commitment to learning and his ability to contribute effectively to the team were invaluable. I have no doubt that Mann will continue to grow and achieve success in his career, and I highly recommend him for any future opportunities in Android development or beyond.

I had the pleasure of working with Mann Ambani on our capstone project, Garden Nerds, as part of our academic team. Mann brought great enthusiasm, creativity, and technical skills to the table. His contributions to the Android development aspect were impressive, and his ability to learn quickly and adapt to new challenges made him a valuable team member. Mannâ€™s collaborative attitude and problem-solving approach were key to the success of our project. Iâ€™m confident heâ€™ll excel in any future endeavors, and I highly recommend him.

I highly recommend Mann Ambani for any future Android development opportunities. He has been an exceptional asset to our team at OOB SMARTHOME over the past year, consistently delivering high-quality code and displaying a deep understanding of Android development principles. Mann's problem-solving skills and attention to detail have greatly contributed to the success and stability of our projects. Additionally, he is an excellent team player, always willing to collaborate and support fellow colleagues. His technical expertise, dedication, and positive attitude make him an outstanding junior Android developer deserving of recognition and further opportunities.
